>
[Sky Hammer](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2872)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=683" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 242 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 70,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Warhammer](/Weapons.aspx?ID=403)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The sturdy head of this _+3 major striking [flaming](/Equipment.aspx?ID=295) [shock](/Equipment.aspx?ID=303) [orichalcum](/Equipment.aspx?ID=276) [warhammer](/Weapons.aspx?ID=47)_ is shaped like a blazing comet. 

**Activate—Comet Fall** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32))  **Trigger** Your attack roll with the _sky hammer_ is a critical success;  **Effect** A 6th-rank arcane [fireball](/Traits.aspx?ID=604) spell explodes, centered on the sky hammer. The spell DC is 45. You are immune to the fireball's effect, though your allies are not.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
